Jest to strona z licznymi narzędziami i: It is a website with many tools and functionalities, created in a modernist style, performs functions as a business card. In addition, it allows you to download most of the completed original projects as well as visit the rest of my pages. I recommend you to take a look and use dark mode.
Zachęcam do wglądu i polecam dark mode: I encourage you to take a look and recommend dark mode
Jestem otwartą kreatywną i ambitną osobą: I am an open creative and ambitious person. I'am interesting in many things from the Middle Ages to astronomy, through stock exchange, computer games, personal development and much more. I have visited over 50 countries and have been an athlete for years, which influenced for the shape of my brain in pursuit after achieving goals. in 2022 I graduated from school qualifying for a scholarship and now I'am looking for a job where I can develop my skills and learn new technologies.
Programowanie zacząłem od lekkiego front: I started programming with a lightweight frontend writing non-dynamic pages. I considered it the basics of the basics at the time, but from the beginning I wanted to learn Python because of the readability and high expressiveness of the code. Over time, I gradually got to know new tools and technologies such as databases, libraries and frameworks. Creating the backend in this case in Django, I felt a lack of frontend skills to implement the graphic design in line with my vision, and I wanted the projects to be refined both from the backend and frontend side. So I decided to go to the next level, learning JavaScript, CSS and still learning the backend, because I could spend a lot of time on it. This page presents my work on both these levels.
